technical_failures.location: Product detail page, primary CTA below product description
technical_failures.expected_behavior: Should add item to shopping cart and show confirmation
technical_failures.actual_behavior: Button click produces no action, no error message displayed
technical_failures.transaction_impact: Complete transaction failure - agent cannot add items to cart, 100% abandonment rate

technical_failures.expected_behavior: Should navigate to support contact page
technical_failures.transaction_impact: Agent cannot reach support if encountering issues, leading to transaction abandonment when problems arise

technical_failures.element: Product thumbnail images in category grid
technical_failures.actual_behavior: Image URLs return 404, showing broken image placeholders
technical_failures.transaction_impact: Agent cannot visually verify products, may skip items or lose confidence in site reliability

contextual_errors.content: ðŸŽ„ Holiday Gift Guide - Perfect Presents for Everyone!
contextual_errors.why_wrong: Current date is February 2026, well past holiday shopping season
contextual_errors.agent_confusion: Agent may interpret as outdated content, skip promotional pricing, or question site maintenance

contextual_errors.content: Product listed as $49.99 in search results but $69.99 on product page
contextual_errors.location: Search results grid vs. product detail page
contextual_errors.why_wrong: Same product shows different prices in different contexts
contextual_errors.agent_confusion: Agent cannot determine correct price, may abandon due to pricing uncertainty or perceived deception

contextual_errors.content: Product shows 'In Stock' on listing but 'Currently Unavailable' at checkout
contextual_errors.why_wrong: Conflicting availability information at different stages
contextual_errors.agent_confusion: Agent proceeds through purchase flow only to fail at final step, wasting processing time

competitive_gaps.competitor_standard: Major e-commerce sites show estimated shipping costs and delivery dates before checkout
competitive_gaps.agent_impact: Agent must proceed through entire checkout flow to discover total cost, increasing friction and abandonment

competitive_gaps.competitor_standard: Show 'In Stock', 'Low Stock', or 'Out of Stock' badges prominently
competitive_gaps.agent_impact: Agent cannot determine if product is available before adding to cart, leading to checkout failures

competitive_gaps.competitor_standard: Detailed specifications section with measurements, materials, care instructions
competitive_gaps.agent_impact: Agent cannot verify product meets requirements, may skip or request additional information
